testsuite.name: Demo QA

testcase.name: Interact in the website

failure.message:
io.cucumber.core.exception.CucumberException: Step [that Andres open de browser and enter the page {string}] is defined with 1 parameters at 'co.com.prueba.demoqa.stepdefinitions.PDemoqaStepDefinition.that_andres_open_de_browser_and_enter_the_page(java.lang.String)'. However, the gherkin step has 2 arguments: * 'https://demoqa.com/' * Table: | button_option | color |
Step text: that Andres open de browser and enter the page 'https://demoqa.com/'
